heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_terrorblade
heroes.bio_loc:
Terrorblade is the demon marauder--an outlaw hellion whom even other demons fear. A cosmic iconoclast, he stole from the Demon Lords, ignored the codified rites that should have bound his behavior, and broke every law of the seven Infernal Regions. For his crimes, he was taught this lesson: even Hell has a hell. A short, brutal trial ensued, with many dead on all sides, and he was finally incarcerated in Foulfell, a hidden dimension where demonkind imprison their own.

But Foulfell is no normal prison. In this dark mirror of reality, demons are sentenced to gaze eternally into the twisted reflection of their own souls. But instead of suffering, Terrorblade made himself master of his own reflected worst self--a raging, thieving demon of unimaginable power. With his inner beast under sway, he destroyed the fractal prison walls and burst free to turn his terror loose upon all creation.
heroes.hype_loc: With Terrorblade, nothing is as it seems. Conjuring powerful illusions to confuse enemies and break their defenses, the demon marauder can exchange health with foes and friends to stave off death or weaken his enemies.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Transforms into a powerful ranged demon

facets.description_loc: There is no minimum health threshold for Sundered enemies.
facets.name: terrorblade_condemned

facets.description_loc: Conjure Image illusions always spawn at full health, but has an additional health cost.
facets.name: terrorblade_soul_fragment

abilities.name: terrorblade_reflection
abilities.desc_loc: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.
abilities.lore_loc: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
notes_loc: Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions, that will be destroyed if the slow debuff is removed.
Reflections can only attack their source.

abilities.name: terrorblade_conjure_image
abilities.desc_loc: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
abilities.lore_loc: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrorblades!
notes_loc: Illusions created by Conjure Image are visually different for enemies.
facets_loc: Conjure Image illusions always spawn at full health, but has an additional health cost.

abilities.name: terrorblade_metamorphosis
abilities.desc_loc: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within %metamorph_aura_tooltip% range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
abilities.lore_loc: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
notes_loc: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Terrorblade was in when the item was used.

abilities.name: terrorblade_demon_zeal
abilities.desc_loc: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement, HP Regen and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain %reflection_pct%%% of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal

abilities.name: terrorblade_terror_wave
abilities.desc_loc: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact and dealing damage, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.

abilities.name: terrorblade_sunder
abilities.desc_loc: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
abilities.lore_loc: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
notes_loc: Debuff Immune enemies don't get their HP modified.
facets_loc: There is no minimum health threshold for Sundered enemies.

abilities.name: terrorblade_dark_unity
abilities.desc_loc: Illusions under Terrorblade's control that are within range receive a damage bonus. Illusions outside of the range receive a damage penalty.
